participant_1.background:

my favorite musical is hamilton.
my dad is an airline pilot.

i want to get married again.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy drinking coffee while watching the sunrise from my balcony, and then I spend the rest of the day doing yoga and writing in my journal.
i look down on people who did not.
I am a strong person who has big dreams and I am not going to let my anxiety get in the way.
I climbed a local mountain with my friends for my birthday.
I treasure my ability to swim.

content.text: Good morning! What's on your agenda for today?
I'm drinking coffee and writing in my journal. I'm feeling really motivated today!
That's great! I'm going to be working on a blog post about my favorite musical.
It's Hamilton! My dad is an airline pilot and he used to take me to see it in New York all the time.
That's awesome! I've never seen it but I've heard great things.
It's really good! I'm also a software engineer. I'm working on a new project right now that's really exciting.
That sounds really cool! I'm glad you're enjoying your work.
Thanks! I am. I'm also looking forward to getting married again someday. I was married once before but we got divorced.
I'm sorry to hear that. But I'm glad you're still looking forward to getting married again.
Thanks. I'm hopeful that I'll find someone who's a good match for me.
I'm sure you will! You seem like a great person.
